response.original_title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom: Gaston's Visit and other adventures
response.overview: Somewhere hidden amongst thorny brambles is a little kingdom of elves and fairies. Everyone who lives here is very, very small. The Little Kingdom is home to Princess Holly and her best friend Ben Elf. Holly is a young fairy who is still learning how to do magic properly. Ben is an elf and elves don't do magic, but they are very good at making things. Along with their friends, Ben and Holly have lots of magical fun and exciting adventures playing together in the Little Kingdom.  Episodes included are:  1) Gaston's Visit;  2) Nanny Plum's Lesson;  3) The Elf Windmill;  4) Mrs Witch;  5) Elf Joke Day;  6) King Thistle's New Clothes;  7) The Elf School;  8) The Royal Golf Course;  9) Morning, Noon And Night;  10) Tadpoles; and  11) A Trip To The Seaside
response.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom: Gaston's Visit and other adventures
